pages.privacy-policy: FantasyStrikers Privacy Policy - Protecting Your Privacy FantasyStrikers Home About us Services Сontact Privacy Policy Welcome to FantasyStrikers! We are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your data when you use our fantasy cricket platform. By accessing or using FantasyStrikers, you agree to the terms of this Privacy Policy. We collect various types of information from users to provide and improve our services. This may include personal information such as your name, email address, date of birth, and payment details. We also collect non-personal information such as browser type, operating system, and IP address. Additionally, we may gather data about your usage patterns, preferences, and interactions with our platform. Your information is used to personalize your experience on FantasyStrikers, facilitate transactions, and provide customer support. We may use your data to communicate with you, deliver relevant content and advertisements, and improve our services. We do not sell your personal information to third parties for marketing purposes. We process your personal information based on legitimate interests, contractual necessity, compliance with legal obligations, and your consent where applicable. This includes providing our services, fulfilling transactions, and complying with legal requirements. FantasyStrikers employs industry-standard security measures to protect your data from unauthorized access, misuse, or alteration. We use encryption, secure servers, and regular security audits to safeguard your information. However, no method of transmission over the internet or electronic storage is completely secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security. We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to enhance your browsing experience on FantasyStrikers. Cookies are small text files stored on your device that help us recognize your preferences and improve our services. You can control cookies through your browser settings and opt-out of certain types of tracking. FantasyStrikers may utilize third-party services and partners to facilitate payments, provide analytics, and deliver advertisements. These third parties have access to your information only as necessary to perform their functions and are obligated not to disclose or use it for any other purpose. We retain your personal information for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this Privacy Policy, unless a longer retention period is required or permitted by law. When we no longer need your information, we securely delete or anonymize it. FantasyStrikers@gmail.com. You have the right to access, update, correct, and delete your personal information held by FantasyStrikers. You can also request restrictions on how we use your data or object to certain processing activities. To exercise your rights, please contact us using the information provided at the end of this Privacy Policy. FantasyStrikers does not knowingly collect personal information from children under the age of 18. If we discover that we have inadvertently gathered information from a child, we will promptly delete it. Parents or guardians who believe their child has provided us with personal information should contact us immediately. Your information may be transferred to and processed in countries outside of your own, where data protection laws may differ. We take measures to ensure that any international transfers comply with applicable data protection laws and provide adequate protection for your information. We may send you marketing communications about FantasyStrikers' products, services, and promotions if you have consented to receive such communications. You can opt-out of receiving marketing messages at any time by following the unsubscribe instructions included in these communications or contacting us directly. FantasyStrikers reserves the right to update or modify this Privacy Policy at any time. We will notify you of significant changes by posting a notice on our website or sending you a direct notification. Your continued use of FantasyStrikers after such modifications will constitute your acknowledgment of the updated Privacy Policy. FantasyStrikers@gmail.com. We may share your personal information with trusted third parties for purposes such as payment processing, fraud prevention, and customer support. These parties are bound by contractual obligations to use your information only as necessary to provide services to FantasyStrikers and to comply with legal requirements. When you interact with FantasyStrikers, such as posting comments or participating in forums, your contributions may be visible to other users and the public. Please exercise caution when disclosing personal information in these areas, as it may be accessed and used by others. In the event of a data breach or security incident involving your personal information, FantasyStrikers will promptly investigate the issue, notify affected users as required by law, and take necessary steps to mitigate any potential harm. We maintain incident response plans to address such situations effectively. FantasyStrikers uses analytics tools to gather information about how users interact with our platform, such as page views, clicks, and user engagement. This data helps us improve our services, enhance user experience, and optimize our marketing efforts. We may disclose your information when required to comply with applicable laws, regulations, legal processes, or government requests. This includes responding to lawful requests from law enforcement agencies, courts, and other public authorities. If you are located in the European Economic Area (EEA) or other jurisdictions with data protection laws, you have the right to lodge a complaint with a supervisory authority if you believe that we have violated your rights under applicable data protection laws. We are committed to cooperating with regulatory authorities to resolve any privacy concerns. Home About us Services Сontact Privacy policy Terms and conditions Disclaimer Participation in fantasy cricket contests involves financial risk and may not be suitable for all users. Please ensure you fully understand the terms and conditions, as well as the rules of each contest, before participating. Remember, there is a possibility of losing real money, and you should only play with funds you can afford to lose. © 2024 FantasyStrikers. All rights reserved.
pages.terms-conditions: FantasyStrikers Terms and Conditions - Your Agreement with Us FantasyStrikers Home About us Services Сontact Terms and Conditions By accessing or using FantasyStrikers, you agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions. If you do not agree with any part of these terms, you may not use our services. These terms constitute a legally binding agreement between you and FantasyStrikers regarding your use of our fantasy cricket platform. You must be at least 18 years old or the legal age of majority in your jurisdiction to participate in fantasy cricket contests on FantasyStrikers. By using our platform, you confirm that you meet these age requirements. FantasyStrikers reserves the right to verify your age and eligibility at any time. To participate in fantasy contests, you must create a user account on FantasyStrikers. You agree to provide accurate, current, and complete information during the registration process. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials and for all activities that occur under your account. You agree to use FantasyStrikers for lawful purposes and in accordance with these terms. You must not engage in any activities that violate applicable laws, infringe upon the rights of others, or interfere with the operation of our platform. Prohibited activities include but are not limited to fraud, hacking, and unauthorized access. FantasyStrikers allows users to participate in fantasy cricket contests where virtual teams are created based on real-life players' performances. Contest rules, scoring systems, and prize structures are provided on the platform and may vary by contest. By entering a contest, you agree to abide by its specific rules and terms. Some fantasy contests on FantasyStrikers may require an entry fee to participate. Entry fees are clearly stated before entering a contest, and you agree to pay the specified fee to join. Prizes are awarded based on contest results and are typically distributed to winners' accounts within a specified timeframe after the conclusion of the contest. FantasyStrikers is committed to fair play and integrity in all contests. Users must create and manage their fantasy teams independently and without collusion with other participants. Any attempt to manipulate contest outcomes or exploit loopholes in the platform's rules may result in disqualification and account suspension. All content and materials on FantasyStrikers, including logos, graphics, and text, are the property of FantasyStrikers or its licensors and are protected by copyright and other intellectual property laws. You may not reproduce, modify, distribute, or publicly display any part of the platform without prior written consent from FantasyStrikers. FantasyStrikers reserves the right to modify or update these Terms and Conditions at any time without prior notice. Changes will be effective upon posting on the platform. It is your responsibility to review these terms periodically for updates. Continued use of FantasyStrikers after modifications constitutes acceptance of the revised terms. FantasyStrikers may suspend or terminate your account and access to our platform if you violate these Terms and Conditions, engage in fraudulent activities, or for any other reason at our discretion. You may also close your account at any time by contacting customer support. FantasyStrikers provides its platform on an "as is" and "as available" basis. We make no warranties or representations regarding the accuracy, reliability, or availability of our services. FantasyStrikers shall not be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages arising from your use of or inability to use our platform. You agree to indemnify and hold FantasyStrikers, its affiliates, officers, directors, and employees harmless from any claims, losses, liabilities, damages, costs, or expenses, including legal fees, arising out of your use of FantasyStrikers, violation of these terms, or infringement of any rights of third parties. Any dispute arising from or relating to these Terms and Conditions or your use of FantasyStrikers shall be resolved through arbitration administered by a recognized arbitration provider. The arbitration shall take place in the jurisdiction where FantasyStrikers is headquartered, and the decision of the arbitrator shall be final and binding. These Terms and Conditions shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws, without regard to its conflict of law principles. Any legal action or proceeding arising out of or related to these terms shall be brought exclusively in the courts. If any provision of these Terms and Conditions is found to be invalid, illegal, or unenforceable, the remaining provisions shall continue in full force and effect to the maximum extent permitted by law. The invalid provision shall be deemed modified to the extent necessary to make it valid and enforceable. FantasyStrikers@gmail.com. These Terms and Conditions constitute the entire agreement between you and FantasyStrikers regarding your use of our platform, superseding any prior agreements or understandings, whether oral or written. The failure of FantasyStrikers to enforce any right or provision of these Terms and Conditions shall not constitute a waiver of such right or provision unless acknowledged and agreed to by us in writing. pages.thanks: Thank You for Choosing FantasyStrikers Going Home Thank you for visiting FantasyStrikers! We appreciate your time and interest in FantasyStrikers. We hope you have found everything you need for your enjoyment of playing FantasyStrikers on our site. If you have any questions or need assistance, feel free to contact our support team. Thank you for choosing FantasyStrikers and we wish you the best of luck in your cricketing adventures!
pages.disclaimer: FantasyStrikers Disclaimer - Important Information for Users FantasyStrikers Home About us Services Сontact Disclaimer FantasyStrikers strives to provide accurate and up-to-date information on its platform, including player statistics, contest rules, and scoring systems. However, we do not guarantee the accuracy, completeness, or reliability of any information displayed on FantasyStrikers. Users should independently verify critical information before making decisions based on it. Fantasy cricket on FantasyStrikers is a form of entertainment and skill-based gaming. It involves creating virtual teams composed of real-life players and competing based on their actual performances in cricket matches. Participation in fantasy contests does not influence the outcome of real-world sporting events. Users acknowledge that participation in fantasy contests on FantasyStrikers may involve financial risk. Entry fees are required to join certain contests, and users may win or lose money based on their performance relative to other participants. FantasyStrikers does not guarantee any financial gains and advises users to play responsibly within their financial means. FantasyStrikers operates in compliance with applicable laws and regulations governing fantasy sports and online gaming. Users are responsible for understanding and complying with local laws regarding online gaming and fantasy sports contests. FantasyStrikers reserves the right to restrict access to its platform in jurisdictions where fantasy sports are prohibited or regulated. FantasyStrikers may display content, advertisements, or links to third-party websites or services for informational purposes. These third-party sources are independent of FantasyStrikers, and we do not endorse or assume responsibility for their content, accuracy, or privacy practices. Users access third-party content at their own risk. FantasyStrikers strives to maintain uninterrupted access to its platform but does not guarantee that the website will be available at all times or free from interruptions, errors, or technical glitches. We reserve the right to suspend or terminate access to the platform for maintenance, upgrades, or other operational reasons without prior notice. To the fullest extent permitted by law, FantasyStrikers disclaims any liability for damages arising from or related to your use of the platform. This includes but is not limited to direct, indirect, incidental, consequential, or punitive damages, even if FantasyStrikers has been advised of the possibility of such damages. Users are solely responsible for their actions and use of FantasyStrikers. This includes maintaining the confidentiality of account credentials, adhering to contest rules and regulations, and ensuring compliance with these terms, applicable laws, and community standards. Users agree to indemnify FantasyStrikers for any losses or damages resulting from their misuse of the platform. FantasyStrikers@gmail.com. FantasyStrikers reserves the right to modify, suspend, or discontinue any part of its platform at any time without prior notice. This includes changes to contest formats, scoring rules, prize structures, and platform features. FantasyStrikers may also update these terms and conditions periodically to reflect changes in our operations or legal requirements. FantasyStrikers is not responsible for any technical problems or failures, including but not limited to network congestion, hardware or software malfunctions, or unauthorized access to user accounts. We strive to address technical issues promptly but cannot guarantee immediate resolution of all problems. By using FantasyStrikers, you consent to the terms outlined in this disclaimer and agree to release FantasyStrikers from any claims, liabilities, or disputes arising from your use of the platform. This disclaimer is an integral part of the agreement between you and FantasyStrikers regarding your participation in fantasy cricket contests. Users acknowledge that FantasyStrikers does not guarantee the availability of specific players for fantasy contests. Player availability may change due to injuries, team selection, or other unforeseen circumstances beyond our control. FantasyStrikers employs measures to maintain the integrity of its contests, including monitoring for suspicious activity, collusion, or any form of cheating. Users found engaging in such activities may be disqualified from contests and face account suspension. FantasyStrikers@gmail.com. FantasyStrikers does not provide financial or investment advice. Users should not interpret any information on the platform as financial guidance or recommendations. Decisions regarding participation in fantasy contests and allocation of funds are solely the responsibility of the user. FantasyStrikers may enter into sponsorship agreements or partnerships with third parties. These relationships may involve promotional activities or co-branded content displayed on the platform. Such sponsorships do not imply endorsement of third-party products or services by FantasyStrikers. FantasyStrikers welcomes user feedback and suggestions for improving our platform. While we appreciate input from our users, please note that any ideas or suggestions submitted to FantasyStrikers become the property of FantasyStrikers and may be used without compensation or acknowledgment. FantasyStrikers shall not be liable for any failure or delay in performing its obligations under these terms due to causes beyond its reasonable control, including but not limited to acts of nature, war, terrorism, labor disputes, or governmental actions. If any provision of this disclaimer is determined to be invalid or unenforceable, the remaining provisions shall continue in full force and effect. The invalid provision shall be deemed modified to the extent necessary to make it valid and enforceable under applicable law. The headings and titles used in this disclaimer are for convenience only and do not affect the interpretation of the provisions herein. Any ambiguity in the interpretation of these terms shall not be construed against the drafting party. FantasyStrikers reserves the right to update or amend this disclaimer at any time. Changes will be effective upon posting on the platform. Users are encouraged to review this disclaimer periodically for updates. Continued use of FantasyStrikers after modifications constitutes acceptance of the revised terms. These terms and conditions shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws, without regard to its conflict of law principles. Any legal action or proceeding arising out of or related to this disclaimer shall be brought exclusively in the courts. pages.index: Welcome to FantasyStrikers - Your Premier Fantasy Cricket Platform FantasyStrikers Home About us Services Сontact Welcome to FantasyStrikers - Your Ultimate Fantasy Cricket Destination! Dive into the thrilling world of fantasy cricket with FantasyStrikers! Build your dream team, compete with friends and fellow enthusiasts, and experience the excitement of cricket like never before. Join now and strike your way to victory! Learn more Core Features Is it worth choosing us? Expert Insights and Analysis Get ahead with in-depth player statistics, expert analysis, and real-time updates. Our platform provides you with all the tools and information you need to make informed decisions and dominate your fantasy league. Seamless User Experience Enjoy a smooth, intuitive interface designed for both seasoned fantasy players and newcomers. Our user-friendly platform ensures hassle-free team management, easy navigation, and a fun-filled fantasy cricket experience. Exclusive Rewards and Prizes Compete in exciting contests and tournaments to win exclusive rewards and prizes. FantasyStrikers offers unique incentives, from cash prizes to special merchandise, making your fantasy cricket journey even more rewarding. Our platform is designed to provide cricket enthusiasts with a dynamic and engaging environment where you can build your dream team, compete with friends, and win exciting prizes. With expert insights, real-time updates, and a seamless user interface, FantasyStrikers is your go-to destination for all things fantasy cricket. Join us and take your love for the game to the next level! Innovation is at the heart of what we do. Our team is constantly working to enhance the FantasyStrikers platform, introducing new features and functionalities to keep the game fresh and exciting. From interactive live scores to customizable team management tools, we aim to offer an unparalleled user experience. Our dedication to continuous improvement means you'll always have access to the latest advancements in fantasy cricket technology. At FantasyStrikers, we value our community above all else. We strive to create a vibrant and inclusive environment where fans can connect, share insights, and celebrate their love for cricket. Our platform hosts regular contests and tournaments, offering opportunities for players to showcase their skills and win exclusive rewards. Join us at FantasyStrikers, where every match is more than just a game—it's an adventure waiting to unfold. Top-Notch Features Limitless Features andEndless Possibilities. Advanced Player Analytics Real-Time Fantasy Scores Customizable Leagues Interactive Draft System Expert Tips and Predictions Instant Notifications Join us now! I accept Privacy policy Submit Power of Usability What Makes FantasyStrikers? Intuitive Interface Navigating through FantasyStrikers is a breeze with our clean and user-friendly design. Whether you are managing your team or checking live scores, every feature is easily accessible, making your fantasy cricket experience smooth and enjoyable. Seamless Integration Sync your account across multiple devices effortlessly. With FantasyStrikers, you can access your fantasy team, stats, and updates on your smartphone, tablet, or computer without missing a beat, ensuring you're always in the game. Quick Setup Get started in no time with our streamlined registration and team setup process. FantasyStrikers allows you to dive into the action quickly, so you can focus on building your dream team and strategizing for victory right away. Personalized Experience Enjoy a customized fantasy cricket experience tailored to your preferences. FantasyStrikers offers personalized recommendations, targeted content, and adjustable settings to match your unique playing style and interests.
